Flow.interviewLabel: NZC EUTax Map Eligible Economic to Business Activities {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: NZC EUTax Map Eligible Economic to Business Activities

recordLookups.name: get_all_NACE_EUTaxonomies_for_this_NACE_code
recordLookups.label: get all NACE-EUTaxonomies for this NACE code

fields.name: txt_autoOrmanual
fields.fieldText:
Do you wish to try to auto match your Business Activities to the Eligible Economic Activities?


Note we will first try and match by NACE code which is only a rough approximation


(Agenforce tie-in here for future iteration)

fields.name: txt_CapexKPIs
fields.fieldText:
The three classifications of CapEx are:


  1. Type A: related to assets or processes that are associated with Taxonomy-aligned economic activities (where turnover is aligned);
  2. Type B: part of a plan to expand Taxonomy-aligned economic activities or to allow Taxonomy-eligible economic activities to become Taxonomy-aligned under conditions specified in the Delegated Act (where turnover is eligible but not aligned); and
  3. Type C: Related to the purchase of output from Taxonomy-aligned economic activities and individual measures enabling the target activities to become low-carbon or to lead to greenhouse gas reductions, provided that such measures are implemented and operational within 18 months (where turnover is not eligible nor aligned).

fields.name: txt_warning1
fields.fieldText: Ensure that your totals do not exceed your undertaking's or asset's Turnover ({!getEUDisco.Turnover__c})

fields.name: txt_warning4
fields.fieldText: Ensure that your totals do not exceed your undertaking's or asset's Capex ({!getEUDisco.Capex_EUR__c})

value.stringValue: Name__c:true, Turnover_EUR__c:false, Capex_A_EUR__c:false, Capex_B_EUR__c:false, Capex_C_EUR__c:false, Opex_A_EUR__c:false, Opex_B_EUR__c:false, Opex_C_EUR__c:false

fields.name: Copy_1_of_txt_KPIOpex
fields.fieldText:
The three classifications of OpEx are:


  1. Type A: related to assets or processes that are associated with Taxonomy-aligned economic activities (where turnover is aligned);
  2. Type B: part of a Capex plan to expand Taxonomy-aligned economic activities or to allow Taxonomy-eligible economic activities to become Taxonomy-aligned within a predefined timeframe specified in the Delegated Act (where turnover is eligible but not aligned); and
  3. Type C: Related to the purchase of output from Taxonomy-aligned economic activities and individual measures enabling the target activities to become low-carbon or to lead to greenhouse gas reductions, provided that such measures are implemented and operational within 18 months (where turnover is not eligible nor aligned).

fields.name: txt_warning2
fields.fieldText: Ensure that your totals do not exceed your undertaking's or assets Opex ({!getEUDisco.Opex_EUR__c})

fields.name: txt_warning3
fields.fieldText: You have not allocated any Opex to this Disclosure, if this was an oversight, go back to the 'Welcome' stage and set this.

value.stringValue: Name__c:true, Turnover_EUR__c:false, Capex_A_EUR__c:false, Capex_B_EUR__c:false, Capex_C_EUR__c:false, Opex_A_EUR__c:false, Opex_B_EUR__c:false, Opex_C_EUR__c:false
Opex Expenditure associated with the Activity

fields.name: txt_Business_Activity
fields.fieldText:
For the following Business Activity:

{!loop_over_unamapped_Biz_Activities.Name__c}


With NACE code:

{!loop_over_unamapped_Biz_Activities.Nace_Activity__r.Name}
